National Security & Veterans

We have a sacred obligation to support those who have served our country and to maintain strong national security. I'm committed to ensuring our veterans receive the care and benefits they've earned, and that our nation remains secure.

Veterans Healthcare

I will fight to ensure veterans have access to quality, timely healthcare by:

  • Fully funding the VA healthcare system
  • Reducing wait times and improving access
  • Expanding mental health services
  • Addressing the unique healthcare needs of women veterans

Veterans Benefits

Veterans deserve the benefits they've earned. I will work to:

  • Streamline the benefits claims process
  • Ensure timely processing of disability claims
  • Protect and expand education benefits
  • Support veteran employment and job training

Addressing Veteran Homelessness

No veteran should be homeless. I support comprehensive programs to prevent and address veteran homelessness, including housing assistance and supportive services.

National Security

I support a strong national security strategy that:

  • Protects our nation from threats
  • Maintains strong alliances
  • Uses diplomacy as a first resort
  • Ensures our military has the resources it needs

Supporting Military Families

Military families make tremendous sacrifices. I will work to support military families through quality education, healthcare, employment opportunities, and community support.
